name: The Temple of KnowlEGG (bugfix)
description:
You are a chicken. Every 10 seconds, you become a chicken with ... a little bit more. Race through The Temple of KnowlEGG, avoiding traps and unlocking vaults. Each vault grants you another power. At the beginning of each level, choose your powers, but each power only lasts for 10 seconds! Speed up and ascend to higher heights to unlock the ultimate secret that as plagued your ancestors since the beginning of consciousness: which came first, chicken or egg?

Play to the end for a surprising song!

All graphics, music, and SFX created in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare 51 game jam.

Fullscreen strongly recommended!
